examples.example: 我很乐意倾听大家的意见，这样能让我不断进步。

translate.english: I am very willing to listen to everyone's opinions, so that I can make continuous progress.

examples.example: 老师经常鼓励我们提出自己的意见，共同营造良好的学习氛围。

translate.english: Teachers often encourage us to put forward our own opinions and jointly create a good learning atmosphere.

examples.example: 我总是积极听取别人的意见，以便让自己变得更加优秀。

translate.english: I always actively listen to others' opinions so as to make myself more excellent.
